title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 41.6 - Multiple borrowers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 41.6 - Multiple borrowers

State Regulations

Where there is more than one borrower on a high cost home
loan, and this Part requires a notice to be given or a signature obtained, such
requirement shall be deemed satisfied by the delivery or placing in the mail
to, or obtaining the signature of, any borrower who is primarily liable on the
high cost home loan. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
41.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
